description: A portLinkStatusChanged trap signifies that the SNMP entity, acting in
an agent role, has detected that the portStatus object for
one of its communication links has changed to a new state as
indicated by portStatus This trap is intended to replace the
functions of the separate traditional linkUp and linkDown traps.

description: This trap signifies that the SNMP entity, acting in
an agent role, has detected that the portStatus object for
one of its communication links has changed to a new state as
indicated by portStatus This trap is intended to replace the
functions of the separate traditional linkUp and linkDown traps.
The OID of this trap does not conform to RFC2576 v1/v2c
interoperability requirements and is deprecated. It should
be replaced with portLinkStatusChanged trap.
